```py
import pandas as pd
import plotly_express as px
```

```py
fig = px.sunburst(grouped_data,
                  path=["GROUP", "FORMATION", "LITH"],
                  values='count',
                  title="Geological Distribution within well 15/9-15",
                  width=800, 
                  height=800,
                  color='LITH')
fig.show()
```
